title: Pass Me Not
raw_lyrics:
Pass me not oh gentle savior
Hear my humble cry
While on others Thou art calling
Do not pass me by

Savior Savior
Hear my humble cry
While on others Thou art calling
Do not pass me by

Let me at the throne of mercy
Find a sweet relief
Kneeling there in deep contrition
Help my unbelief

lines: Pass me not oh gentle savior
While on others Thou art calling
While on others Thou art calling
Let me at the throne of mercy
